getData

public final java.util.Map<XId,java.util.Map<XAddress,java.lang.Object>> getData(XComponent<?> targetComponent)
Returns data for parts in the identified component.

This method returns a map, in which each entry associates a map that associates a target id with a map from a source address to the data from that part.

Specified by:
getData in interface XBorder
Parameters:
targetComponent - the component for which data should be returned
Returns:
data for the identified target
